title: Apply a Promo Code at Checkout
description: A customer is at the checkout page and wants to apply a promotional code for a discount.

tasks.description: Navigate to the checkout page with items in the cart.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is ready to complete their purchase.

tasks.description: Enter a valid promo code into the designated field.
The system validates the code and applies the discount to the order total.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order total is updated to reflect the discount, and the customer can complete the purchase at the lower price.
